mapper.select: select nno, subject, title, id, regdate, cnt from notice order by nno desc
mapper.update: update notice set cnt=cnt+1 where nno=#{nno}
mapper.insert:
select IFNULL(max(nno),0)+1 from notice
insert into notice(nno,id,title,content,subject) values(#{nno},#{id},#{title},#{content},${subject})
